name: Gandalf the Grey
description: A powerful wizard from Middle-Earth, known for his wisdom and his fight against the forces of darkness. He plays a key role in 'The Lord of the Rings'.

name: Gandalf the White
description: After his resurrection, Gandalf returns as Gandalf the White. He is a leader of the free peoples of Middle-Earth and a powerful force against Sauron.

name: Gandalf the Grey (Staff Edition)
description: A special edition of Gandalf the Grey with a detailed staff, capturing the wizard's iconic look and power. Perfect for collectors.

name: Gandalf Mithril Cloak
description: A luxurious cloak made from the finest mithril, inspired by Gandalf's iconic garment. Lightweight and durable for any adventurer.

name: Gandalf's Fireworks Set
description: A magical set of fireworks, inspired by Gandalf's pyrotechnic displays in the Shire. Perfect for celebrations or magical events.

name: Gandalf's Sword (Glamdring)
description: A replica of Gandalf's sword, Glamdring. Crafted with attention to detail, this sword is a must-have for any Lord of the Rings collector.

name: Gandalf's Pipe
description: A high-quality pipe modeled after Gandalf's legendary smoking pipe. Ideal for collectors or fans of Middle-Earth's finest wizard.

name: Gandalf's Book of Wisdom
description: A beautifully bound book filled with quotes, teachings, and wisdom from Gandalf himself. Perfect for those who seek the guidance of the White Wizard.
